name: Infinitely up 2
description:
Description

Infinitely up 2 - this is the second part of the physical puzzle, where you need to build a tower of randomly drawn shapes. The higher your tower the more points you get. The difficulty is that the pieces are physical and can fall down, then you lose and you need to start over. Try to figure out in advance how the figures will behave, just use ingenuity to more conveniently place the figures. Can you build the highest tower?

Features:

- Simple and addictive gameplay

- Pretty picture

- Pleasant music

- A variety of shapes

- Several modes
